SELECT DELIVERY_STATUS, COUNT(DELIVERY_STATUS) AS STATUS_COUNT FROM TBL_ORDER
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -#{before})) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
GROUP BY DELIVERY_STATUS ORDER BY DELIVERY_STATUS

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.ORDERNO ORDER BY A.ORDERNO DESC) AS NUM,A.ORDERNO,B.PNO,B.ONO,A.ORDERDATE,C.BRAND,C.PNAME,C.PRODUCT_THUMURL,B.OPTIONCOLOR, B.OPTIONSIZE, B.INVENTORY, C.PRICE, A.DELIVERY_STATUS, A.REVIEW_STATUS FROM TBL_ORDER A INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO INNER JOIN PRODUCT C ON B.PNO = C.PNO
WHERE A.MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE A.MNO = #{mno} AND A.DELIVERY_STATUS = #{status} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE A.MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -#{before})) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE A.MNO = #{mno} AND A.DELIVERY_STATUS = #{status} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -#{before})) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
ORDER BY ORDERDATE DESC, NUM ASC

SELECT ORDERNO,ORDERDATE FROM TBL_ORDER
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND DELIVERY_STATUS = #{status} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -#{before})) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND DELIVERY_STATUS = #{status} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -#{before})) AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
ORDER BY ORDERDATE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C.PNO ORDER BY C.PNO DESC) AS NUM,A.ORDERNO,B.PNO,A.ORDERDATE,C.BRAND,C.PNAME,C.PRODUCT_THUMURL,B.OPTIONCOLOR, B.OPTIONSIZE, B.INVENTORY, C.PRICE, C.SHIPPING_FEE, A.DELIVERY_STATUS FROM TBL_ORDER A INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO INNER JOIN PRODUCT C ON B.PNO = C.PNO WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{orderno} ORDER BY C.PNO ASC
SELECT * FROM TBl_BANNER WHERE BANNER_STATUS = 1 AND AREA = #{area} ORDER BY BNO DESC
